column4: my husband's computer - kubuntu 9.10 won't let him type more than 2 letters, even to login. what to do?

my husband's computer - kubuntu 9.10 won't let him type more than 2 letters, even to login. what to do?
if you have a livecd i suggest restarting the system with that and test if the keyboard works properly there.
